text: Tractor Stadium or Tractor's Shahid Bakeri Stadium is a stadium in Tabriz, Iran. It is currently used mostly for football matches Tractor Academy and training ground for the Tractor. The stadium holds 7,000 people and renovated in 2011 by Iran Tractor Manufacturing Company. Tractor 0 - 0 Perspolis at Tractor Stadium, 10 September 2016 ==See also== * Sahand Stadium * Takhti Stadium (Tabriz) * Marzdaran Stadium ==References== Category:Football venues in Iran Category:Sports venues in Tabriz Category:Tractor S.C. Category:Association football training grounds in Iran
title: Tractor Stadium
